resources.string: RoverOpen is developed at Distributed Organisms. DO researches swarm robots and is a daughter company of the Dutch research company Almende B.V. This Android app is coded for the community to showcase rapid protyping. Most of our swarm solutions use more dedicated robots. See for example http://www.fireswarm.nl for one of our latest projects.
RoverOpen is released under GPLv3 license, http://gplv3.fsf.org/
Backwards drive of right side of robot
Backwards drive of left side of robot
Forwards drive of right side of robot
Forwards drive of left side of robot
